author: Luke Yee <lucyee01@meta.com>
description:
Hi Piotr,

Hope you are well in these interesting times. My name's Luke and I support Meta's Software Engineer Leadership hiring and I wanted to reach out to you as your years in the industry shows you are someone who is working at the highest level of technical excellence. I also noticed you've interviewed with us before so I'm happy to discuss our options!

We are excited to announce the release of Llama 4<https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fai.meta.com%2Fblog%2Fllama-4-multimodal-intelligence%2F&h=AT0l8T9P1riTpH1EBN6IFPS9lKINDXjuRWkGbSPWbY0ovYeJAyyoyv-QACyJjh-i4p7BjP5kwnLlAOqpdsC6EQul0bWaJcXgva1fuWDol9MWX9sNYRW0q2xE8IkVJu2U_HX837XR0FlXNw3WysJrjo3Z2a3W3EMsk3_EFBpbk_o>!

  *   Llama 4 Scout and Llama 4 Maverick, are the first open-weight natively multimodal models with unprecedented context length support and our first built using a mixture-of-experts (MoE) architecture.
  *   We are also previewing Llama 4 Behemoth, one of the smartest LLMs in the world and our most
title: Following up - Senior Technical Leadership Opportunities at Meta

title: Piotr, start a conversation with your new connection, Monika
